data.heading: The Unstoppable Stopping Power of TV
TV is Digital, and it’s Everywhere
data.paragraph:
Now more than ever, consumers are accessing live TV content on their laptops, tablets, and mobile devices. TV is no longer in competition with Digital because TV is Digital.
On average, 89.5% of adults 18+ spend over four hours a day watching live TV. Our targeted solutions can help you reach them on every screen, anytime, anywhere.

data.heading: TV Drives Online Engagement
data.paragraph: Watching TV is now a multi-screen activity, as evidenced by the 80% of viewers who use a laptop, tablet, or smartphone to browse the internet while watching. Whether they’re researching a product, joining the conversation on social media, or visiting a specific website, TV influences consumers to seek out more information online.

data.heading: Use Data and Targeting to Spend Smart
data.paragraph: We know more about your customers than anyone else. Use the power of data to get your message in front of the right people, at the right time.

stories.heading: Start with Television:
stories.paragraph: Your brand deserves to be seen. Get in front of your most valuable customers by advertising on the top 50+ cable networks, with the best in sports, news, and entertainment programming.

stories.heading: Expand on multiple screens:
stories.paragraph: Reach your customer wherever they’re watching with targeted ads on TV, online, and on mobile.

stories.heading: Reach even more:
stories.paragraph: With exclusive, interactive products created for businesses who want to build deeper relationships with customers.

data.heading:
Immerse Your Brand
in the Best Content
data.paragraph: With over 400 of the best shows across the top 50+ cable networks, it’s easy to connect with your target audience in the content they love most.

steps.label: Scale that works for you
steps.heading: Scale that works for you
steps.paragraph: Whether you want to reach over 27 million households or just the homes within two miles of your business, we have you covered. We’re talking 41 states and 100+DMAs.

steps.label: Focus on where you need to be
steps.heading: Focus on where you need to be
steps.paragraph: If your business is invested in only one part of the country, narrow your target for a wiser spend.

steps.label: Aim for a smaller target
steps.heading: Aim for a smaller target
steps.paragraph: Your business only serves one market area. This is so easy.

steps.label: Where you are is where it’s at
steps.heading: Where you are is where it’s at
steps.paragraph: This is your zone, your town, your neighbourhood. Get ready with a smile because your customers are going to be dropping by.
